definitions.text: socialization through training and education to develop one's mind or manners
(agriculture) production of food by preparing the land to grow crops (especially on a large scale)
a highly developed state of perfection; having a flawless or impeccable quality; ; ; --Joseph Conrad
examples: I admired the exquisite refinement of his prose
almost an inspiration which gives to all work that finish which is almost art

definitions.text: the process of fostering the growth of something
examples: the cultivation of bees for honey

definitions.text: the act of raising or growing plants (especially on a large scale)
